faq.answer: GITAM has a strong placement cell that connects students with top recruiters across industries. The placement office conducts training, mock interviews, and career guidance sessions.
Admissions to GITAM are based on entrance tests such as GAT, along with merit in qualifying exams. Students can apply online through the official GITAM admissions portal.
GITAM provides separate hostel facilities for boys and girls, with options for single and shared rooms, Wi-Fi, and dining facilities.
The GITAM central library has thousands of books, e-resources, journals, and digital study materials. It is open for students and staff throughout the week.
GITAM offers scholarships based on merit, sports, and financial need. Students are encouraged to check the scholarships page on the official website for eligibility and details.
